name: Model Acts Program
objective:
The purpose of the Model Acts Program includes:   A) advising states on establishing laws and policies
to address illicit drug use issues and (B) revising such model state drug laws and draft supplementary model state laws to take into consideration changes in illicit drug use issues in the state involved.
applicant_types: Private nonprofit institution/organization (includes institutions of higher education and hospitals)
Public nonprofit institution/organization (includes institutions of higher education and hospitals)

authorizations.text: Reauthorization of the Office of National Drug Control Policy (ONDCP), Public Law 115-271.
